mapper.insert: INSERT INTO THEATER(THEATERID, THEATERSTART, THEATEREND, THEATERNAME, MOVIEID, KIND) VALUES(THEATER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{theaterStart}, #{theaterEnd},#{theaterName}, #{movieId}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT M.MOVIETITLE, T.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM THEATER WHERE THEATERNAME = #{theaterName} AND ( TRUNC(THEATERSTART) = #{theaterStart} OR TRUNC(THEATEREND) = #{theaterStart} ) )T JOIN MOVIES M ON T.MOVIEID = M.MOVIEID ORDER BY THEATERSTART
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIEBOOKS WHERE THEATERID = #{theaterId}
